TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Application extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides methods and properties to manage an application, such as methods to start and stop an application, to process Windows messages, and properties to get information about an application.

span.span: Provides methods and properties to manage an application, such as methods to start and stop an application, to process Windows messages, and properties to get information about an application.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类具有方法来启动和停止应用程序和线程，并处理 Windows 消息，如下所示：The class has methods to start and stop applications and threads, and to process Windows messages, as follows: - 当前线程上启动应用程序消息循环，并 （可选） 将使窗体可见。 starts an application message loop on the current thread and, optionally, makes a form visible. - 或停止消息循环。 or stops a message loop. - 虽然您的程序是在循环中处理的消息。 processes messages while your program is in a loop. - 将消息筛选器添加到应用程序消息泵来监视 Windows 消息。 adds a message filter to the application message pump to monitor Windows messages. - 可停止来自正在引发的事件或调用事件处理程序之前执行特殊操作。 lets you stop an event from being raised or perform special operations before invoking an event handler. 此类具有和属性获取或设置区域性的当前线程的信息。This class has and properties to get or set culture information for the current thread. 无法创建此类的实例。You cannot create an instance of this class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了在窗体上的列表框中的数字。The following code example lists numbers in a list box on a form. 每次单击`button1`，应用程序向列表添加另一个数。Each time you click `button1`, the application adds another number to the list. `Main`方法调用以启动应用程序，创建表单时，`listBox1`和`button1`。The `Main` method calls to start the application, which creates the form, `listBox1` and `button1`. 当用户单击`button1`，则`button1_Click`方法将显示。When the user clicks `button1`, the `button1_Click` method displays a . 如果用户单击`No`上，则`button1_Click`方法向列表添加一个数字。If the user clicks `No` on the , the `button1_Click` method adds a number to the list. 如果用户单击`Yes`，应用程序调用来处理队列中的所有剩余消息，然后退出。If the user clicks `Yes`, the application calls to process all remaining messages in the queue and then to quit. > [!NOTE] > 对调用在部分信任中将失败。The call to will fail in partial trust. [!code-cpp[Classic Application Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: Adds a message filter to monitor Windows messages as they are routed to their destinations.

span.span: Adds a message filter to monitor Windows messages as they are routed to their destinations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要防止引发特定事件或执行特殊操作事件传递到事件处理程序之前，请使用消息筛选器。Use a message filter to prevent specific events from being raised or to perform special operations for an event before it is passed to an event handler. 消息筛选器是唯一的特定线程。Message filters are unique to a specific thread. 若要防止消息被调度`value`传递给此方法的参数实例必须重写代码，以处理消息的方法。To prevent a message from being dispatched, the `value` parameter instance that you pass to this method must override the method with the code to handle the message. 该方法必须返回 `false`。The method must return `false`. > [!CAUTION] > 将消息筛选器添加到应用程序的消息泵可能会降低性能。Adding message filters to the message pump for an application can degrade performance. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建名为消息筛选器`TestMessageFilter`。The following code example creates a message filter called `TestMessageFilter`. 此筛选器会阻止与鼠标按钮相关的所有消息。This filter blocks all messages relating to the left mouse button. 可以使用消息筛选器之前，必须提供一个实现接口。Before you can use a message filter, you must provide an implementation for the interface. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.RemoveMessageFilter Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Custom Event ApplicationExit As EventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when the application is about to shut down.

span.span: Occurs when the application is about to shut down.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须将附加到的事件处理程序事件来执行未处理状态，该应用程序停止运行前必需任务。You must attach the event handlers to the event to perform unhandled, required tasks before the application stops running. 你可以关闭打开的此应用程序或释放的垃圾回收未回收的对象文件。You can close files opened by this application, or dispose of objects that garbage collection did not reclaim. 由于这是一个静态事件，必须分离附加到此事件中的任何事件处理程序事件处理程序本身。Because this is a static event, you must detach any event handlers attached to this event in the event handler itself. 如果未分离这些处理程序，它们将保持附加在该事件并继续占用的内存。If you do not detach these handlers, they will remain attached to the event and continue to consume memory. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示两个窗体，并退出应用程序，这两个窗体关闭时。The following code example displays two forms and exits the application when both forms are closed. 当应用程序启动并退出时，会记住每个窗体的位置。When the application starts and exits, the position of each form is remembered. 此示例演示如何使用事件，以了解窗体位置应永久保存到文件，以及时`FileStream`应将其关闭。This example demonstrates using the event to know when the form positions should be persisted to the file, and when the `FileStream` should be closed. 该类`MyApplicationContext`继承和跟踪的每个窗体处于关闭状态，并在它们都时退出当前线程时间。The class `MyApplicationContext` inherits from and keeps track of when each form is closed, and exits the current thread when they both are. 在关闭时，类会记住每个窗体的位置。The class remembers the position of each form when it is closed. 当发生事件时，类将每个用户的位置写入到文件。When the event occurs, the class writes the positions of each for the user to the file. 窗体位置数据存储在名为的文件`appdata.txt`由在位置创建。The form position data is stored in a file titled `appdata.txt` that is created in the location determined by . `Main`方法调用`Application.Run(context)`以启动应用程序提供。The `Main` method calls `Application.Run(context)` to start the application given the . 此代码是一段摘录所示示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 请参阅有关整个代码列表。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果路径不存在，被创建一个采用以下格式：If a path does not exist, one is created in the following format: *基路径*\\\\\\*Base Path*\\\\\\ 第一个看起来是否包含主可执行文件的程序集具有`AssemblyInformationalVersion`上它的属性。 first looks to see if the assembly containing the main executable has the `AssemblyInformationalVersion` attribute on it. 如果存在此属性，它使用两个和。If this attribute exists, it is used for both and . 如果此属性不存在，这两个属性使用的可执行文件的版本。If this attribute does not exist, both properties use the version of the executable file instead. 路径将会不同，具体取决于是否使用部署 Windows 窗体应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。The path will be different depending on whether the Windows Forms application is deployed using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 应用程序存储在每个用户应用程序缓存中 C:\Documents and Settings\\*用户名*目录。 applications are stored in a per-user application cache in the C:\Documents and Settings\\*username* directory. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig void DoEvents() cil managed

summary.span: Processes all Windows messages currently in the message queue.

span.span: Processes all Windows messages currently in the message queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 运行 Windows 窗体，它会创建新窗体，然后等待要处理的事件。When you run a Windows Form, it creates the new form, which then waits for events to handle. 在窗体处理的事件，每次处理所有与该事件关联的代码。Each time the form handles an event, it processes all the code associated with that event. 在队列中等待所有其他事件。All other events wait in the queue. 虽然你的代码处理事件时，你的应用程序不响应。While your code handles the event, your application does not respond. 例如，如果另一个窗口拖到顶部，也无法重新绘制窗口。For example, the window does not repaint if another window is dragged on top. 如果调用在代码中，你的应用程序可以处理其他事件。If you call in your code, your application can handle the other events. 例如，如果您将添加到数据的窗体并添加到代码中，你的窗体可时重新绘制另一个窗口拖到它。For example, if you have a form that adds data to a and add to your code, your form repaints when another window is dragged over it. 如果你删除在代码中，你的窗体不会重新绘制按钮的单击事件处理程序完成之前执行。If you remove from your code, your form will not repaint until the click event handler of the button is finished executing. 消息传送的详细信息，请参阅[在 Windows 窗体中的用户输入](~/docs/framework/winforms/user-input-in-windows-forms.md)。For more information on messaging, see [User Input in Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/user-input-in-windows-forms.md). 与不同的是 Visual Basic 6.0方法不会调用方法。Unlike Visual Basic 6.0, the method does not call the method. 通常情况下，在处理消息循环中使用此方法。Typically, you use this method in a loop to process messages. > [!CAUTION] > 调用此方法会导致当前线程暂停，但所有等待窗口消息进行都处理。Calling this method causes the current thread to be suspended while all waiting window messages are processed. 如果一条消息将导致触发的事件，可能执行的应用程序代码其他区域。If a message causes an event to be triggered, then other areas of your application code may execute. 这会导致出现意外的行为难以调试的应用程序。This can cause your application to exhibit unexpected behaviors that are difficult to debug. 如果执行的操作或需要较长时间的计算，通常最好是新线程上执行的运算。If you perform operations or computations that take a long time, it is often preferable to perform those operations on a new thread. 有关异步编程的详细信息，请参阅[异步编程模型 (APM)](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md)。For more information about asynchronous programming, see [Asynchronous Programming Model (APM)](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/asynchronous-programming-model-apm.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates using the method. 如果该示例运行时，用户可以选择从图形文件。When the example runs, a user can select graphics files from an . 在窗体中显示所选的文件。The selected files are displayed in the form. 方法强制重新绘制的每个打开的图形文件的窗体。The method forces a repaint of the form for each graphics file opened. 若要运行此示例中，粘贴以下代码在一个窗体，其中包含名为`PictureBox1`，则名为`OpenFileDialog1`，和一个名为按钮`fileButton`。To run this example, paste the following code in a form containing a named `PictureBox1`, an named `OpenFileDialog1`, and a button named `fileButton`. 调用`InitializePictureBox`并`InitializeOpenFileDialog`窗体的构造函数中的方法或`Load`方法。Call the `InitializePictureBox` and `InitializeOpenFileDialog` methods from the form's constructor or `Load` method. > [!NOTE] > 在 Visual Studio 中，如果您将添加向窗体通过使用拖放操作，您必须修改以下`InitializeOpenFileDialog`方法删除创建的新实例的代码行。In Visual Studio, if you add an to your form by using a drag operation, you will have to modify the following `InitializeOpenFileDialog` method by removing the line that creates a new instance of . 该示例还需要的事件控件并事件的连接到在示例中定义的事件处理程序。The example also requires that the event of the control and the event of the are connected to the event handlers defined in the example. 当运行示例时，通过单击按钮显示的对话框。When the example is running, display the dialog box by clicking the button. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CPP/filedialogform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/CS/filedialogform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.FileDialog/VB/filedialogform.vb#1)]

summary.span: Enables visual styles for the application.

span.span: Enables visual styles for the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法使应用程序的可视样式。This method enables visual styles for the application. 视觉样式已颜色、 字体和其他可视元素构成操作系统主题。Visual styles are the colors, fonts, and other visual elements that form an operating system theme. 如果该控件和操作系统支持它，将以视觉样式绘制控件。Controls will draw with visual styles if the control and the operating system support it. 若要具有某个效果，请必须在该应用程序; 中创建的任何控件之前调用通常情况下，是中的第一行`Main`函数。To have an effect, must be called before creating any controls in the application; typically, is the first line in the `Main` function. 启用视觉样式，调用时不需要单独清单。A separate manifest is not required to enable visual styles when calling . > [!NOTE] > 在.NET Framework 2.0 中前,`FlatStyle`的一些控件，如派生的控件的属性，必须设置为用于以视觉样式绘制的控件顺序。Prior to the .NET Framework 2.0, the `FlatStyle` property of some controls, such as controls that derive from , had to be set to in order for the controls to be drawn with visual styles. 在使用.NET Framework 2.0 编写的应用程序，这是不再必要。In applications written with the .NET Framework 2.0, this is no longer necessary. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不会影响 Internet Explorer 中承载的控件。This method will have no effect for controls hosted in Internet Explorer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用在`Main`函数，以使应用程序的可视样式。The following code example demonstrates calling in the `Main` function to enable visual styles for the application. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。To run the example code, paste it into a Windows Forms and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: Informs all message pumps that they must terminate, and then closes all application windows after the messages have been processed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法对所有线程停止所有正在运行消息循环，并关闭所有窗口的应用程序。The method stops all running message loops on all threads and closes all windows of the application. 此方法并不强制退出该应用程序。This method does not necessarily force the application to exit. 通常从调用中使用消息循环，并强制返回。The method is typically called from within a message loop, and forces to return. 若要退出当前线程的消息循环，请调用。To exit a message loop for the current thread only, call . 引发以下事件，并执行相关联的条件操作： raises the following events and performs the associated conditional actions: - 一个为每个窗体，由表示引发事件属性。A event is raised for every form represented by the property. 此事件可通过设置取消的属性及其参数`true`。This event can be canceled by setting the property of their parameter to `true`. - 如果一个或多个处理程序将取消该事件，然后返回，而不执行进一步的操作。If one of more of the handlers cancels the event, then returns without further action. 否则为事件引发的每个打开的窗体，然后关闭所有正在运行的消息循环和窗体。Otherwise, a event is raised for every open form, then all running message loops and forms are closed. > [!NOTE] > 方法不会引发并事件，已过时的[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]。The method does not raise the and events, which are obsolete as of [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了在窗体上的列表框中的数字。The following code example lists numbers in a list box on a form. 每次单击`button1`，应用程序向列表添加另一个数。Each time you click `button1`, the application adds another number to the list. `Main`方法调用以启动应用程序，创建表单时， `listBox1`，和`button1`。The `Main` method calls to start the application, which creates the form, `listBox1`, and `button1`. 当用户单击`button1`，则`button1_Click`方法将添加到列表框中，一到三个数字并显示。When the user clicks `button1`, the `button1_Click` method adds numbers one to three to the list box, and displays a . 如果用户单击**否**上，则`button1_Click`方法向列表添加另一个数。If the user clicks **No** on the , the `button1_Click` method adds another number to the list. 如果用户单击**是**，应用程序调用，来处理队列中的所有剩余消息，然后退出。If the user clicks **Yes**, the application calls , to process all remaining messages in the queue and then to quit. 该示例需要`listBox1`和`button1`已实例化并已放置在窗体上。The example requires that `listBox1` and `button1` have been instantiated and placed on a form. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.Exit Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.Exit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您有必须执行的任务在线程进入空闲状态之前，请将它们附加到此事件。If you have tasks that you must perform before the thread becomes idle, attach them to this event. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体，并确保事件处理程序与事件。To run the example code, paste it into a Windows Form and make sure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 本地用户是指其用户配置文件存储在其的用户登录的系统。A local user is one whose user profile is stored on the system on which the user logged on. 如果路径不存在，被创建一个采用以下格式：If a path does not exist, one is created in the following format: *基路径*\\\\\\*Base Path*\\\\\\ 典型的基路径是 C:\Documents and Settings\\*用户名*settings\application Data。A typical base path is C:\Documents and Settings\\*username*\Local Settings\Application Data. 此路径将会不同，但是，如果通过使用部署 Windows 窗体应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。This path will be different, however, if the Windows Forms application is deployed by using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 创建其自己的应用程序数据目录的独立于所有其他应用程序。 creates its own application data directory that is isolated from all other applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示两个窗体，并退出应用程序，这两个窗体关闭时。The following code example displays two forms and exits the application when both forms are closed. 当应用程序启动并退出时，会记住每个窗体的位置。When the application starts and exits, the position of each form is remembered. 虽然此示例演示如何使用属性来存储用户的应用程序数据可改为使用。Although this example demonstrates using the property to store application data for the user, the can be used instead. `MyApplicationContext`类继承自时每个窗体处于关闭状态，并在它们都时退出当前线程保持跟踪。The `MyApplicationContext` class inherits from and keeps track when each form is closed, and exits the current thread when they both are. 类用于存储用户的每个窗体的位置。The class stores the positions of each form for the user. 窗体位置数据存储在名为的文件`Appdata.txt`由在位置创建。The form position data is stored in a file titled `Appdata.txt` that is created in the location determined by . `Main`方法调用`Application.Run(context)`以启动应用程序提供。The `Main` method calls `Application.Run(context)` to start the application given the . 此代码是一段摘录所示示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示一些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅有关整个代码列表。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您正在绘制的自定义控件，使用此属性来确定是否要绘制控件使用或不具有可视样式，使其外观与应用程序中其他控件保持一致。If you are drawing a custom control, use this property to decide whether to draw the control with or without visual styles, so that its appearance is consistent with other controls in the application. 下表显示了四个条件必须存在以返回`true`。The following table shows the four conditions that must exist for to return `true`. |条件Condition|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |操作系统支持视觉样式The operating system supports visual styles|若要单独验证这种情况，请使用 类的 属性。To verify this condition separately, use the property of the class.| |用户已启用操作系统中的视觉样式The user has enabled visual styles in the operating system|若要单独验证这种情况，请使用 类的 属性。To verify this condition separately, use the property of the class.| |在应用程序中启用了可视样式Visual styles are enabled in the application|可以通过调用 方法或使用指定用 ComCtl32.dll 版本 6 或更高版本绘制控件的应用程序清单来启用应用程序中的视觉样式。Visual styles can be enabled in an application by calling the method or by using an application manifest that specifies that ComCtl32.dll version 6 or later will be used to draw controls.| |正在使用视觉样式绘制的应用程序窗口工作区Visual styles are being used to draw the client area of application windows|若要单独验证这种情况，请使用 类的 属性，验证它是否具有 或 值。To verify this condition separately, use the property of the class and verify that it has the value or .|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的最常见原因`Restart`是启动新版本的应用程序的已通过下载[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]使用`Update`或`UpdateAsync`方法。The most common reason for calling `Restart` is to start a new version of the application that you have downloaded through [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] using the `Update` or `UpdateAsync` method. 他们首次运行所在的上下文中重新启动应用程序。Applications are restarted in the context in which they were initially run. 如果你的应用程序已启动使用 URL 直接指向应用程序的主可执行文件，它将使用相同的 URL 重启。If your application was started using a URL pointing directly to the application's main executable file, it will be restarted using the same URL. 如果你的应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]应用程序，它将在重新启动使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。If your application is a [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] application, it will be restarted using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. 如果你的应用程序在它首次执行时已提供了命令行选项将启动应用程序使用相同的选项。If your application was originally supplied command-line options when it first executed, will launch the application again with the same options.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在基于 Win32 的或 Windows 窗体应用程序消息循环是处理用户事件，如鼠标单击和键盘键击的代码中的例程。In a Win32-based or Windows Forms application, a message loop is a routine in code that processes user events, such as mouse clicks and keyboard strokes. 每个正在运行的基于 Windows 的应用程序需要活动的消息循环，调用主消息循环。Every running Windows-based application requires an active message loop, called the main message loop. 关闭后主消息循环，该应用程序将退出。When the main message loop is closed, the application exits. 在 Windows 窗体中此循环时，将关闭调用方法时，或当正在运行的主消息循环的线程上调用方法。In Windows Forms, this loop is closed when the method is called, or when the method is called on the thread that is running the main message loop. 大多数 Windows 窗体开发人员将不需要使用此版本的方法。Most Windows Forms developers will not need to use this version of the method. 应使用重载来启动应用程序主窗体，以便在应用程序终止时关闭主窗体。You should use the overload to start an application with a main form, so that the application terminates when the main form is closed. 对于所有其他情况下，使用重载，该产品支持提供更好地控制应用程序的生存期的对象。For all other situations, use the overload, which supports supplying an object for better control over the lifetime of the application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 消息循环运行，直到或称为或上下文对象上引发事件。The message loop runs until or is called or the event is raised on the context object. ## Examples 此示例显示两个窗体，并退出应用程序，这两个窗体关闭时。The example displays two forms and exits the application when both forms are closed. 当应用程序启动并退出时，会记住每个窗体的位置。When the application starts and exits, the position of each form is remembered. 此示例演示如何使用，连同`Application.Run(context)`方法，在应用程序启动时显示多个窗体。This example demonstrates how to use an , along with the `Application.Run(context)` method, to display multiple forms when the application starts. 该类`MyApplicationContext`继承时每个窗体处于关闭状态，并在它们都时退出当前线程保持跟踪。The class `MyApplicationContext` inherits from and keeps track when each form is closed, and exits the current thread when they both are. 类用于存储用户的每个窗体的位置。The class stores the positions of each form for the user. 窗体位置数据存储在名为的文件`Appdata.txt`由在位置创建。The form position data is stored in a file titled `Appdata.txt` that is created in the location determined by . `Main`方法调用`Application.Run(context)`以启动应用程序提供。The `Main` method calls `Application.Run(context)` to start the application given the . 代码`AppForm1`和`AppForm2`起见不显示窗体。The code for the `AppForm1` and `AppForm2` forms is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅类概述有关整个代码列表。See the class overview for the whole code listing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，应用程序的 main 函数调用此方法，并将传递给它的应用程序的主窗口。Typically, the main function of an application calls this method and passes to it the main window of the application. 此方法将添加到事件处理程序`mainForm`参数事件。This method adds an event handler to the `mainForm` parameter for the event. 事件处理程序调用清理应用程序。The event handler calls to clean up the application. > [!NOTE] > 方法的类将在此方法返回之前调用。The method of the class will be called prior to the return of this method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例列出了在窗体上的列表框中的数字。The following code example lists numbers in a list box on a form. 每次单击`button1`，应用程序向列表添加另一个数。Each time you click `button1`, the application adds another number to the list. `Main`方法调用以启动应用程序，创建表单时， `listBox1`，和`button1`。The `Main` method calls to start the application, which creates the form, `listBox1`, and `button1`. 当用户单击`button1`，则`button1_Click`方法将添加到列表框中，一到三个数字并显示。When the user clicks `button1`, the `button1_Click` method adds numbers one to three to the list box, and displays a . 如果用户单击**否**上，则`button1_Click`方法向列表添加另一个数。If the user clicks **No** on the , the `button1_Click` method adds another number to the list. 如果用户单击**是**，应用程序调用来处理队列中的所有剩余消息，然后退出。If the user clicks **Yes**, the application calls to process all remaining messages in the queue and then to quit. 该示例需要`listBox1`和`button1`已创建并已放置在窗体上。The example requires that `listBox1` and `button1` have been created and placed on a form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果应用程序不会在 20 秒内未响应的挂起请求，Windows 将确定它处于无响应状态，并且，应用程序可以置于休眠状态或终止。If an application does not respond to a suspend request within 20 seconds, Windows determines that it is in a non-responsive state, and that the application can either be put to sleep or terminated. 一旦应用程序响应的挂起请求，但是，可能需要的任意时间它需要清理资源，并关闭活动进程。Once an application responds to a suspend request, however, it can take whatever time it needs to clean up resources and shut down active processes.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 Windows 窗体线程和其他线程上发生的异常发生的异常的事件处理程序。The following code example sets event handlers for exceptions that occur on Windows Forms threads and exceptions that occur on other threads. 它会设置，以便所有异常都处理应用程序，而不考虑应用程序的用户配置文件中的设置。It sets so that all exceptions are handled by the application, regardless of the settings in the application's user configuration file. 它使用事件来处理 UI 线程异常和事件来处理非 UI 线程异常。It uses the event to handle UI thread exceptions, and the event to handle non-UI thread exceptions. 由于不能阻止的应用程序终止，该示例只记录错误终止之前在应用程序事件日志中。Since cannot prevent an application from terminating, the example simply logs the error in the application event log before termination. 此示例假定您已经定义了两个控件，`button1`并`button2`，然后在你类。This example assumes that you have defined two controls, `button1` and `button2`, on your class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 它通常不是可行捕捉所有由 Windows 窗体引发的异常。It is often not feasible to catch all of the exceptions thrown by Windows Forms. 使用此方法，可以指示你的应用程序是否应捕获引发的 Windows 窗体组件的所有未处理的异常并继续操作，或它是否应将它们公开给用户并暂停执行。Using this method, you can instruct your application whether it should catch all unhandled exceptions thrown by Windows Forms components and continue operating, or whether it should expose them to the user and halt execution. 调用实例化应用程序使用的主窗体之前方法。Call before you instantiate the main form of your application using the method. 捕获在不创建的线程中发生的异常并拥有的 Windows 窗体使用事件处理程序。To catch exceptions that occur in threads not created and owned by Windows Forms, use the event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 Windows 窗体线程和其他线程上发生的异常发生的异常的事件处理程序。The following code example sets event handlers for exceptions that occur on Windows Forms threads and exceptions that occur on other threads. 它会设置，以便所有异常都处理应用程序，而不考虑应用程序的用户配置文件中的设置。It sets so that all exceptions are handled by the application, regardless of the settings in the application's user configuration file. 它使用事件来处理 UI 线程异常和事件来处理非 UI 线程异常。It uses the event to handle UI thread exceptions, and the event to handle non-UI thread exceptions. 由于不能阻止的应用程序终止，该示例只记录错误终止之前在应用程序事件日志中。Since cannot prevent an application from terminating, the example simply logs the error in the application event log before termination. 此示例假定您已经定义了两个控件，`button1`并`button2`，然后在你类。This example assumes that you have defined two controls, `button1` and `button2`, on your class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件，在 Windows 窗体应用程序与 Windows 窗体线程中发生的句柄否则为未经处理的异常。This event allows your Windows Forms application to handle otherwise unhandled exceptions that occur in Windows Forms threads. 附加到事件处理程序事件来处理这些异常，这会将你的应用程序处于未知状态。Attach your event handlers to the event to deal with these exceptions, which will leave your application in an unknown state. 如有可能，应通过结构化异常处理块处理异常。Where possible, exceptions should be handled by a structured exception handling block. 您可以更改是否通过设置情况下，使用 Windows 窗体线程的未处理异常的此回叫。You can change whether this callback is used for unhandled Windows Forms thread exceptions by setting . 捕获在不创建的线程中发生的异常并拥有的 Windows 窗体使用事件处理程序。To catch exceptions that occur in threads not created and owned by Windows Forms, use the event handler. > [!NOTE] > 若要确保此事件没有激活会丢失，必须附加一个处理程序，然后再调用。To guarantee that no activations of this event are missed, you must attach a handler before you call . > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置 Windows 窗体线程和其他线程上发生的异常发生的异常的事件处理程序。The following code example sets event handlers for exceptions that occur on Windows Forms threads and exceptions that occur on other threads. 它会设置，以便所有异常都处理应用程序，而不考虑应用程序的用户配置文件中的设置。It sets so that all exceptions are handled by the application, regardless of the settings in the application's user configuration file. 它使用事件来处理 UI 线程异常和事件来处理非 UI 线程异常。It uses the event to handle UI thread exceptions, and the event to handle non-UI thread exceptions. 由于不能阻止的应用程序终止，该示例只记录错误终止之前在应用程序事件日志中。Since cannot prevent an application from terminating, the example simply logs the error in the application event log before termination. 此示例假定您已经定义了两个控件，`button1`并`button2`，然后在你类。This example assumes that you have defined two controls, `button1` and `button2`, on your class. [!code-cpp[Classic Application.ThreadException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ThreadException Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic Application.ThreadException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ThreadException Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic Application.ThreadException Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic Application.ThreadException Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须将附加到的事件处理程序事件执行任何未经处理的、 所需任务的线程停止运行前。You must attach the event handlers to the event to perform any unhandled, required tasks before the thread stops running. 关闭打开的此线程或释放的垃圾回收器未回收的对象文件。Close files opened by this thread, or dispose of objects that the garbage collector did not reclaim. > [!CAUTION] > 由于这是一个静态事件，必须释放你的应用程序，或会导致内存泄漏时分离事件处理程序。Because this is a static event, you must detach your event handlers when your application is disposed, or memory leaks will result. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解事件发生的并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑更换与或将消息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，将其粘贴到 Windows 窗体，并确保事件处理程序相关联事件。To run the example code, paste it into a Windows Forms and ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: Gets the path for the application data of a user.

span.span: Gets the path for the application data of a user.

value.span: 用户的应用程序数据的路径。

span.span: The path for the application data of a user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果路径不存在，被创建一个采用以下格式：If a path does not exist, one is created in the following format: *基路径*\\\\\\*Base Path*\\\\\\ 此路径中存储的数据是启用漫游用户配置文件的一部分。Data stored in this path is part of user profile that is enabled for roaming. 漫游用户在网络中的多台计算机上工作。A roaming user works on more than one computer in a network. 漫游用户的用户配置文件在网络上的服务器上，并在用户登录时加载到系统上。The user profile for a roaming user is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on. 为用户配置文件以作为漫游，操作系统必须支持漫游配置文件并且必须启用它。For a user profile to be considered for roaming, the operating system must support roaming profiles and it must be enabled. 典型的基路径是 C:\Documents and Settings\\*用户名*\Application Data。A typical base path is C:\Documents and Settings\\*username*\Application Data. 此路径将会不同，但是，如果通过使用部署 Windows 窗体应用程序[!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]。This path will be different, however, if the Windows Forms application is deployed by using [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[ndptecclick](~/includes/ndptecclick-md.md)] 创建其自己的应用程序数据目录的独立于所有其他应用程序。 creates its own application data directory that is isolated from all other applications. 有关详细信息，请参阅[访问本地数据和 ClickOnce 应用程序中的远程数据](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d)。For more information, see [Accessing Local and Remote Data in ClickOnce Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/be5cbe12-6cb6-49c9-aa59-a1624e1eef3d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示两个窗体，并退出应用程序，这两个窗体关闭时。The following code example displays two forms and exits the application when both forms are closed. 当应用程序启动并退出时，会记住每个窗体的位置。When the application starts and exits, the position of each form is remembered. 此示例演示如何使用属性来存储用户的应用程序数据。This example demonstrates using the property to store application data for the user. 该类`MyApplicationContext`继承时每个窗体处于关闭状态，并在它们都时退出当前线程保持跟踪。The class `MyApplicationContext` inherits from and keeps track when each form is closed, and exits the current thread when they both are. 类用于存储用户的每个窗体的位置。The class stores the positions of each form for the user. 窗体位置数据存储在名为的文件`Appdata.txt`由在位置创建。The form position data is stored in a file titled `Appdata.txt` that is created in the location determined by . `Main`方法调用`Application.Run(context)`以启动应用程序提供。The `Main` method calls `Application.Run(context)` to start the application given the . 此代码是一段摘录所示示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示一些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅有关整个代码列表。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CPP/source.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[Application#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Application/VB/source.vb#5)]

value.span: 一个 ，它表示特定于用户的应用程序数据的注册表项。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果键不存在，它被创建采用以下格式：If the key does not exist, it is created in the following format: CurrentUser\Software\\\\\\CurrentUser\Software\\\\\\ 数据存储在此项是启用漫游用户配置文件的一部分。Data stored in this key is part of user profile that is enabled for roaming. 漫游用户在网络中的多台计算机上工作。A roaming user works on more than one computer in a network. 漫游用户的用户配置文件在网络上的服务器上，并在用户登录时加载到系统上。The user profile for a roaming user is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on. 为用户配置文件以作为漫游，操作系统必须支持漫游配置文件并且必须启用它。For a user profile to be considered for roaming, the operating system must support roaming profiles and it must be enabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，则应用程序中的所有打开窗体的属性将设置为`true`。When this property is set to `true`, the property of all open forms in the application will be set to `true`. 在所有窗体上设置此属性之前，不会返回此调用。This call will not return until this property has been set on all forms. 有一个长时间运行的操作，并且想要在所有应用程序窗体中指示该操作仍在处理时，请使用此属性。Use this property when you have a long-running operation, and want to indicate in all application forms that the operation is still processing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这属性确定是否在客户端区域或应用程序窗口非工作区中启用了可视样式。This property determines whether visual styles are enabled in client areas or nonclient areas of application windows. 通常情况下，应在主窗体的构造函数内设置此属性或事件处理程序。Generally, this property should be set within the main form's constructor or event handler. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性设置为之一值内事件处理程序控件。The following code example sets the property to one of the values within the event handler for a control. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分枚举。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the enumeration.
